fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 124.31 lakh crore compared with Rs 343.05 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 91.65 points or 0.51% to settle at 17,944.20. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.51% to 13.09. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank and Adani Enterprises were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
